trans-unit.source: Represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: Representa a largura de parágrafo possíveis mais pequeno e maior totalmente pode conter o conteúdo de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se value é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: É adequado para utilização em estruturas de dados e algoritmos, tais como uma tabela hash de hash.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que representa o código hash para o objeto atual.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the largest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a maior largura de parágrafo possíveis que pode conter completamente o conteúdo de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the largest paragraph width possible.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a maior largura de parágrafo possíveis.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the smallest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a menor largura de parágrafo possíveis que pode conter completamente o conteúdo de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The minimum paragraph width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width in the text content.
trans-unit.target: A largura mínima parágrafo corresponde ao word que tenha a maior largura de conteúdo de texto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the smallest paragraph width possible.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa a menor largura de parágrafo possíveis.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for equality.
trans-unit.target: Comparar dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> cadeias de igualdade.

trans-unit.target: A primeira instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Comparar dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objetos para inequality.

trans-unit.source: The objects are equal if their <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são iguais se os seus <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A>propriedades são iguais.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.target: to show left is equal to right; otherwise, .
